statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT location, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT location, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01' GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 GROUP BY location HAVING total_records >= 3;
SELECT location, MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp < '2022-04-01' GROUP BY location ORDER BY max_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT city, date, consumption FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT city, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY city;
SELECT city, date, consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT AVG(consumption), city FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY city ORDER BY AVG(consumption) DESC
SELECT city, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY city HAVING total_consumption > 500 ORDER BY total_consumption ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE city IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles', 'Chicago') ORDER BY city ASC, date DESC
SELECT location, COUNT(sensor_id) AS sensor_count FROM sensors GROUP BY location HAVING sensor_count >= 5 ORDER BY sensor_count DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT city_name, country FROM city_details;
SELECT user_id, energy_usage FROM user_data WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT city_name, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN city_details ON energy_consumption_data.city_id = city_details.city_id;
SELECT user_id, city_name, energy_reading FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN user_data ON energy_consumption_data.city_id = user_data.city_id;
SELECT city_name, country FROM city_details WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, city_name, energy_usage FROM user_data JOIN city_details ON user_data.city_id = city_details.city_id;
SELECT city_name, energy_reading FROM city_details JOIN energy_consumption_data ON city_details.city_id = energy_consumption_data.city_id;
SELECT city_name, energy_usage FROM user_data JOIN city_details ON user_data.city_id = city_details.city_id WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData
SELECT city_name, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT provider_name, energy_source FROM EnergyProviders WHERE city_name = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM Buildings WHERE construction_year > 2000
SELECT saving_type, saved_amount FROM EnergySavings ORDER BY saving_date ASC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE city_name = 'New York' AND energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT provider_name, energy_source, city_name FROM EnergyProviders WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT building_name, building_type, construction_year FROM Buildings ORDER BY construction_year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT city_name, saving_type, saved_amount FROM EnergySavings WHERE saving_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY saved_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, installation_date FROM smart_devices ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT provider_name, fuel_type FROM energy_providers WHERE fuel_type = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT timestamp, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS devices_count FROM smart_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumers INNER JOIN locations ON energy_consumers.location_id = locations.location_id;
